title.rendered: “Israeli Combat Aircraft Target and Destroy Hezbollah’s Rocket Launch Sites in Lebanon: An In-depth Report”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

Launch sites from which rockets were fired into Israeli territory and military sites were targeted and destroyed by combat aircraft, targeting Hezbollah’s terror targets in Lebanon.

A short time ago, combat aircraft attacked Hezbollah’s terror targets in Lebanese territory. As part of the completed attack, the forces attacked and destroyed launch sites from which rockets had been fired into Israeli territory in recent days, and military sites from which the organization’s terrorists operated.

In addition, during the afternoon hours, a number of rocket launches were detected crossing from Lebanon into various areas in the north of the country.

IDF forces attacked the sources of the fire.

The following is a documentation on the matter: https://bit.ly/3sJDoeH
